alert.note: Alert for Little Snake; White River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 04 at 1:32PM MDT until July 04 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR DRY THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 200 AND 202... * AFFECTED AREA...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 200 Little Snake Forecast Area and Fire Weather Zone 202 White River Forecast Area. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...22 to 27 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions will become favorable for easy ignition and rapid spread of fires due to low relative humidity and strong gusty winds. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered to widespread coverage may result in numerous lightning starts. Hail and damaging wind gusts are possible as well. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts of 40-60 mph.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning for dry thunderstorms means that scattered to widespread coverage with the potential for numerous fire ignitions from lightning.
